sent.orig: The plan is divided into term, intermediate-term and long-term goals.
sent.trans: 这一计划包括短期、中期以及长期目标。

sent.orig: The medium term and short term trends are bearish while the long term trend is sideways.
sent.trans: 中短期趋势为熊市，而长期趋势为横线。

sent.orig: Mortgages payable, long-term leases, long-term notes payable, bond payable are a few examples of long-term liabilities.
sent.trans: 应付抵押借款、长期租赁、应付长期票据，以及应付债券都是长期负债的例子。

sent.orig: Short-term synaptic plasticity includes two forms, short-term enhancement and short-term depression.
sent.trans: 短时程突触可塑性包括短时程增强和短时程压抑两种类型。

sent.orig: Referring to the longer-term (mid-term and long-term) course is the characteristic of voltage stability.
sent.trans: 电压稳定能涉及中长期过程是电压稳定问题的特色。
